name: The Wrath Of The Blood Phantom
name_original: The Wrath Of The Blood Phantom
description:
PLOT
On a stormy night in 1992 the automatic locks at Harkerfeild Asylum clicked open.
You take control of Harkerfield's most feared killer... The Blood Phantom!

CONTROLS
Menu Navigation: ARROW KEYS
Movement: WASD / MOUSELOOK
Attack: LEFT MOUSECLICK
Switch Weapon: 1 / MOUSEWHEEL
Map: 2
Interact: SPACEBAR
Menu: ESCAPE KEY

MOUSE FIX
Right click the game ".exe" and click properties. 
Under the compatibility click the "Change High DPI Settings" button.
Then tick both boxes for "Program DPI" and "High DPI Scaling Behavior".
This should improve mouse responsiveness.

CREDITS
This Game was made by Pepper for the E1M1 Jam in 2021.
JAM: E1M1 Game Jam in 2021. (https://itch.io/jam/e1m1-game-jam)
ENGINE: Raycast Game Engine. (https://www.moddb.com/engines/raycasting-game-maker)
TEXTURES: Public Domain Images. (https://opengameart.org/)
MUSIC: Dial-Up For Murder. (https://dialupformurder.bandcamp.com/)
OTHER AUDIO: Public Domain Sounds. (https://opengameart.org/)

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING! HAVE A GREAT DAY
